definition: to shake/to flap/to vibrate/to resonate/to rise up with spirit/to rouse oneself
to wash/to squander/to sweep away/to move/to shake/dissolute/pond
variant of 燙|烫[tang4]/variant of 趟[tang4]

sentences.english: The tapered coaxial slow-wave-structure is the most important part of a MILO.
sentences.chinese: 渐变型同轴慢波结构是磁绝缘线振荡器的核心部分。

sentences.english: The clock of the crystal oscillator can be used for clocking the microcontroller.
sentences.chinese: 该晶体振荡器的时钟可用于微控制器的时钟。

sentences.english: If hands don’t do the job, maybe a vibrator or other sex toy will.
sentences.chinese: 如果手不凑效，还有振荡器或别的性玩可用。

sentences.english: Quartz crystal oscillator is one of the most stability frequency references.
sentences.chinese: 石英晶体振荡器是一种非常重要的频率源。

sentences.english: The behaviour of passively Q-switched solid-state lasers containing intracavity optical parametric oscillators(OPOs) is described in detail.
sentences.chinese: 理论分析了被动调Q固体激光泵浦的光参量振荡器。

sentences.english: Differential-tuned double-gate coupling VCO with symmetrically optimized-size design.
sentences.chinese: 对称最佳尺寸设计之差动压控双闸耦合振荡器。

sentences.english: This vibrator motor is quieter, softer, and all-around less annoying than its counter-weighted predecessor.
sentences.chinese: 振荡器的点击更安静，轻柔，比他的前辈好多了。

sentences.english: The transverse model spectral method is widely applied to numerical simulations of FEL oscillators .
sentences.chinese: 横模谱方法广泛应用于自由电子激光振荡器数值模拟。

sentences.english: Voltage controlled crystal oscillator(VCXO)plays an important roll in the atomic frequency standard.
sentences.chinese: 压控晶体振荡器是原子频标的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: DRO(dielectric resonator oscillator) has the characteristics of high frequency stability and low phase noise.
sentences.chinese: 介质振荡器具有频率稳定性好，相位噪声低的特性。

sentences.english: Coaxial slow wave structure (SWS) is the most important part in MILO.
sentences.chinese: 同轴慢波结构是磁绝缘线振荡器的核心部分。

sentences.english: Pin 4 is the VCO output, which will oscillate regardless of input.
sentences.chinese: 引脚4是压控振荡器的输出，这将振荡无论投入。

sentences.english: A quasi-ring oscillator is used and high efficiency of laser output can be achieved.
sentences.chinese: 振荡器采用准环形振荡，能获得高效率激光输出。

sentences.english: The oscillator has been used as second local oscillator of the satelite broadcast televisor.
sentences.chinese: 该振荡器已用作卫星直播电视接收机的第二本振源。

sentences.english: In this paper, radiation of the space charge in a magnetically insulated transmission line oscillator (MILO) is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了磁绝缘线振荡器中空间电荷的辐射。

sentences.english: It runs with its own high performance oscillator.
sentences.chinese: 它跑与它自己的高性能振荡器。

definition: filtering radio waves (i.e. to pick out one frequency)
